name: MyHouse
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my house
Developer Terms of Use
des: My House Things allows triggers of routines through. The idea here is to be able to ask alexa how long the coffee machine has been on or start a routine that sets up the lights around your house to your desired pre-programmed setting. There is nothing the user can actually program in the app -- it's more of a query app only.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
